resources.string: You have incorrectly attempted to unlock SHIELD %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, SHIELD will be reset to factory default and all user data will be lost.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock SHIELD %d times. SHIELD will now be reset to factory default.
You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, you will be asked to unlock SHIELD using an email account.\n\n Try again in %d seconds.
